units.title: Seed cell suspension
units.text: Seed 100 µL of the stock cell suspension per well of a U-shaped ultra-low attachment 96-well plate.
units.rationale: Creates individual hPSC aggregates for organoid formation.

units.title: Centrifuge plate
units.text: Centrifuge the plate at 300g and 4 °C for 3 min to bring the cells to the culture plate bottom, and place the plate into the incubator.
units.rationale: Ensures cells settle into a single aggregate at the well bottom.

units.title: Add Matrigel droplet
units.text: Pipet 20 µL of Matrigel into an empty well of the 96-U-well plate.
units.rationale: Provides a matrix for embedding each aggregate.

units.title: CHIR treatment
units.text: Add 200 µL RB−/CHIR per well by depressing the plunger of the pipet only until the ﬁrst stop.
units.rationale: Initiates WNT activation for directed differentiation.

units.title: First medium change (CHIR removal)
units.text: Add 200 µL RB− per well by depressing the plunger of the pipet only until the ﬁrst stop.
units.rationale: Removes CHIR after 24 h to control exposure time.

units.title: IWP2 treatment
units.text: Add 200 µL RB−/IWP2 per well by depressing the plunger of the pipet only until the ﬁrst stop.
units.rationale: Inhibits WNT signaling to promote cardiac lineage specification.

units.title: Final medium change (RB+)
units.text: Add 200 µL RB+ per well by depressing the plunger of the pipet only until the ﬁrst stop.
units.rationale: Supports maturation of organoids after differentiation.

units.title: Remove medium without damaging Matrigel
units.text: Remove the culture medium from the wells without aspirating or damaging the Matrigel droplets with the aggregates.
units.rationale: Preserves embedded aggregates for consistent treatment.

units.title: Pick and transfer aggregate
units.text: Pick a properly formed aggregate. To do this, use the cut tip (from Step 16), hold the plate almost perpendicularly and aspirate the aggregate.
units.rationale: Allows precise handling of individual aggregates for embedding.

units.title: Fixation before flow cytometry
units.text: Resuspend the cell pellets in 50 µL of ﬁxation solution, and incubate for 10 min at room temperature.
units.rationale: Stabilizes cellular proteins for downstream staining and analysis.
